articles.title: It's in the eyes: Researchers discover novel way to identify AI-generated faces - Firstpost

articles.title: In a first, forever chemicals decomposed using light at room temperature - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: The photocatalytic method uses visible light to break down forever chemicals at room temperature into fluorine ions.
